mapper.select: select *, production_name as productionName from es_production where id=#{productionId}

select o.id as id, o.province_id as provinceId, o.production_id as productionId, o.city_id as cityId, o.area_id as areaId, o.buy_count as buyCount, o.total_money as totalMoney, o.address as address, o.backup_time as backupTime, o.custom_name as customName, o.phone as phone, o.status as status, o.order_time as orderTime, o.assign_time as assignTime, p.province_name as provinceName, c.city_name as cityName, a.area_name as areaName, g.agent_name as agentName from es_order_back_up o left join es_province p on o.province_id = p.id left join es_city c on o.city_id = c.id left join es_area a on o.area_id = a.id left join es_agent g on o.agent_id = g.id order by o.order_time desc limit #{start},#{end}
